Titre: S4.E1 ∙ The One with the Jellyfish
Description: Ross chooses between Rachel and his bald-headed girlfriend Bonnie; Joey, Chandler, and Monica have a perilous encounter with a jellyfish at the beach.

Titre: S4.E2 ∙ The One with the Cat
Description: Phoebe becomes convinced that the spirit of her dead mother is inside a cat. Chandler and Joey are robbed. Monica goes on a date with a guy from her high school.

Titre: S4.E3 ∙ The One with the 'Cuffs
Description: Monica tries to avoid criticism when she caters a party for her mother. Chandler ends up half naked and handcuffed to a chair in Rachel's boss's office. Joey tries to get educated from a salesman trying to sell him a set of encyclopedias.

Titre: S4.E4 ∙ The One with the Ballroom Dancing
Description: Joey is forced to help Treeger learn how to dance after he threatens to have Monica and Rachel evicted. Phoebe develops a crush on one of her clients. Ross tries to help Chandler quit the gym.

Titre: S4.E5 ∙ The One with Joey's New Girlfriend
Description: Chandler develops feelings for Joey's new girlfriend. Ross and Rachel try to make each other jealous with their dates. Phoebe's cold gives her a sexy singing voice.

Titre: S4.E6 ∙ The One with the Dirty Girl
Description: Ross's new girlfriend is nearly perfect until he discovers her apartment is very dirty. Chandler buys a better birthday present for Kathy than Joey. Phoebe helps Monica cater an event. Rachel is obsessed at finishing a crossword puzzle by herself.

Titre: S4.E7 ∙ The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
Description: Chandler is guilt-ridden after kissing Kathy. Ross starts playing the keyboard again and everyone except Phoebe thinks he's terrible. Joey dates someone else while still attached to Kathy.

Titre: S4.E8 ∙ The One with Chandler in a Box
Description: Chandler tries to earn Joey's forgiveness by lying in a wooden box for six hours. Monica accidentally gets ice in her eye and her doctor turns out to be Richard's son and it's discovered Rachel exchanges the gifts she received in the past.

Titre: S4.E9 ∙ The One Where They're Going to Party!
Description: Monica ends up having to choose between a head chef position or the catering business she started with Phoebe. Rachel is close to getting a promotion but tragedy strikes. Chandler and Ross are excited when an old friend is coming to town.

Titre: S4.E10 ∙ The One with the Girl from Poughkeepsie
Description: In order for her kitchen staff to acknowledge her authority, Monica hires Joey so she can fire him in front of them. Chandler unsuccessfully tries to set Rachel up with a co-worker. Ross can't choose between two girls.

Titre: S4.E11 ∙ The One with Phoebe's Uterus
Description: Newlyweds Frank and Alice ask Phoebe to be their surrogate. Joey gets a job as a tour guide at Ross's museum. Chandler asks Monica and Rachel for advice on how to sexually satisfy Kathy.

Titre: S4.E12 ∙ The One with the Embryos
Description: Phoebe's uterus is examined for implantation of the embryos. Meanwhile, a seemingly harmless game between Chandler and Joey against Monica and Rachel escalates into a full blown contest where the stakes are raised higher and higher.

Titre: S4.E13 ∙ The One with Rachel's Crush
Description: After seeing Kathy's play, Chandler becomes convinced she is cheating on him with her co-star. Rachel develops a crush on one of her customers. Monica becomes jealous when she realizes she is no longer the 'hostess'.

Titre: S4.E14 ∙ The One with Joey's Dirty Day
Description: Joey arrives on the set of his latest movie unwashed, after a three-day fishing trip with his dad. Rachel sets up Ross with the niece of her boss. Chandler goes through three phrases to help recover from Kathy cheating on him.

Titre: S4.E15 ∙ The One with All the Rugby
Description: Chandler runs into Janice, and finds her more irritating than ever. Meanwhile, Ross attempts to learn how to play rugby to impress Emily and Monica obsesses over a electric switch.

Titre: S4.E16 ∙ The One with the Fake Party
Description: Rachel organizes a fake good bye party for Emily so she can spend time with Joshua. A side effect from her pregnancy causes Phoebe to have a craving for meat.

Titre: S4.E17 ∙ The One with the Free Porn
Description: Chandler and Joey discover that they're getting a free porn channel on their TV. Monica encourages Ross to tell Emily he loves her just before she leaves for London. Phoebe gets a shock when she visits her OB-GYN.

Titre: S4.E18 ∙ The One with Rachel's New Dress
Description: Rachel has an awkward encounter with Joshua's parents. Phoebe is offered the chance to name one of the triplets. Ross becomes paranoid when Emily goes to London with Susan.

Titre: S4.E19 ∙ The One with All the Haste
Description: Ross proposes to Emily. Monica and Rachel try to win their apartment back from Chandler and Joey.

Titre: S4.E20 ∙ The One with All the Wedding Dresses
Description: Monica tries on Emily's wedding dress, and can't stop wearing it. Jealous of Ross's proposal to Emily, Rachel tries to talk Joshua into marriage. Chandler takes Joey to a sleep clinic when he starts snoring.

Titre: S4.E21 ∙ The One with the Invitation
Description: As Ross and Emily send out wedding invitations, he and Rachel each look back on their relationship together while Joey and Chandler look for a purpose in life.

Titre: S4.E22 ∙ The One with the Worst Best Man Ever
Description: At first Ross chooses Joey to be his best man but after a mishap at his bachelor party, he decides he wants both Joey and Chandler as his best men. Phoebe's mood swings makes Monica and Rachel nervous.

Titre: S4.E23 ∙ The One with Ross's Wedding: Part 1
Description: Phoebe tries to help Rachel deal with her feelings for Ross as the rest of the gang head to London for Ross and Emily's wedding.

Titre: S4.E24 ∙ The One with Ross's Wedding: Part 2
Description: Phoebe tries to warn the gang that Rachel is coming to London to tell Ross she still loves him. Ross and Emily's parents get into an argument over the bill for the wedding. Monica and Chandler sleep together. The wedding ends with a gaffe.
